mainHeaderSection.heading: Job Work Management
mainHeaderSection.maintitle: Job Work Management Built for Manufacturing Needs
mainHeaderSection.description: Tech Cloud ERP’s Job Work Management module streamlines subcontracting operations by providing complete control over material movement, job tracking and vendor coordination. It helps businesses efficiently manage the entire job work process from PO creation to payment. The system ensures real-time inventory updates, accurate records and faster vendor settlements.

featureSections.featuredesc: Begin your job work cycle by entering job work orders. This captures key details like items to be processed, job type, vendor details, and expected return dates laying the groundwork for tracking and execution.
Keep track of materials sent to subcontractors but not yet returned. This helps monitor pending GRNs (Goods Receipt Notes), ensuring accurate material tracking and timely follow-up with vendors.

videosection.title: Track Every Job Order with Confidence
videosection.description: Handle outsourced processes like a pro. This module helps you monitor job work orders, raw material movement and contractor performance. Ensure accountability at every stage and get clear records of costs and timelines.

faqs.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.title: Everything You Need to Know About Our CRM Solution

items.question: What is the Job Work module in ERP?
items.answer: The Job Work module manages outsourced processing activities, tracking raw material sent, finished goods received and vendor charges.

items.question: Can I track materials sent to vendors?
items.answer: Yes. The system logs all issued materials as vendor-held stock, ensuring full traceability until they’re returned.

items.question: How are payments to job workers managed in the system?
items.answer: The system helps in managing job worker billing, tracks service charges based on tasks done and links it with approvals and payment schedules to ensure timely and accurate payouts.

items.question: Is the job work module adaptable to different industries?
items.answer: Absolutely. It supports industry-specific workflows across sectors like manufacturing, textiles, engineering and more—making it a flexible solution for varied operational needs.
